billEvents.eventText: referred to tourism, arts and sports development

title: Provides for the promotion and marketing of hunting and fishing in N.Y. state
summary: Provides for the promotion and marketing of hunting and fishing in NYS; requires tourist promotion agencies to publish on website information regarding hunting and fishing, and to distribute brochures and maps at local offices; provides for a fishing promotion program and a hunting promotion program.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to promoting and marketing hunting and fishing in New York state
